dataList.content: Hopkins' face quickly turned into a cold frown.
It was in such a start contrast to the face he showed in front of Vergilius, I shuddered in fright.
Don't you know why we bothered to let a feather of a fallen Wing in our Office?
To, to deal with requests taking place in L Corp. branches more safely...
Exactly. I didn't even expect much from a low-rank agent.
You had two jobs: lead the way, and tell us how to deal with those Abnormaladies or whatever.
And look. If all you have to say is “Oh nooo, I’ve never seen those before”, what do you expect us to do? Huh?
Gosh, Hopkins, feeling hangry? Take it easy~
If they are in fact new to Yuri, then these might be another type of entity derived from Abnormalities… Perhaps a new species of it.
That Corporation might not have had every specimen in their confinement, either.
There is no reason to lambaste yourself for neglecting to remember what you were never taught.
What's there to argue about? All that matters is we beat 'em to death, isn't it?
Give the word, and we'll do it.
